Chris Harley

Full Stack Developer | Creative Thinker

Hi, I'm a software engineer based in Atlanta, Ga. I love developing full stack applications and learning new things.

- About Me

Hello, I'm Chris a fullstack developer based in Atlanta, GA.

I enjoy learning and creating things that live on the internet. My goal is to build applications that look amazing and help people fix real world problems that they're having. I enjoy expressing myself through creativity/art and I have a passion for problem solving.

Here are some technologies I've been working with lately:

  • - JavaScript (ES6+)
  • - React
  • - Node.js
  • - HTML & (S)CSS
  • - MongoDB
  • - postgreSQL
